questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

questions.question: Is there a setup fee?
questions.answer: No, there are no setup fees or hidden costs. You only pay the monthly or annual subscription.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. No questions asked.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my limits?
questions.answer: We'll notify you before you reach your limits and help you upgrade to a suitable plan.
